__e: Oh, no, Roy, that didn't go well at all.
Roy never said anything. No one said anything.
Roy, do you know what? I don't want this shit in my life again. Do you understand me?
Roy is the type of a friend you'd never introduce to your other friends or bring home to your family.
Roy's the reason that my life is... Is pretty much the best it's ever really been, John.
I was thinking... if Roy really is out there... maybe he's still in touch with somebody from his past.
I told you, my son Roy is a special kid.
You know that you know too much, just like Roy and my mom did. They found you once.
This Roy... is more than just a friend, isn't he?
That Roy killed my sister and it's not his fault?
Oh, I know what Roy did for me, Pa... ... butI don'tlovehim .
I owed his boss big-time and if I didn't...
Roy... Please just tell me what's going on here.
I gave you that mask... so you could help the police, not run from them.
Come on, Roy. I know you better than that.
Roy's told me all about you.
Hey, Roy, listen, I'm sorry, man.
Roy told me everything that John did.
